answers.answer: i am 25 now and i have been an addict since i was 15...i got on methadone when i was 19. worst mistake of my life...i just got off methadone 2 months ago and was the worst withdrawl of my life. just from personal experience maybe u should try the suboxone/subutex program...i currently just got on subutex and i loved the way it worked and i didnt have to go to the methadone clinic everyday anymore, which was a big lift off my shoulder's...my doctor just switched me to suboxone though and today was the first day i took it and it is working just fine. if u decide to do the methadone program please make sure they explain to you what it does to your body and how it stays in your fat cells (which is the reason it is so hard to come off of) because when i started a doctor never told me how bad it would be to come off it...honestly i now feel methadone clinics don't give a **** about how people are doing, all they care about is how much money they can make. whatever u decide, best wishes and i hope all goes well for you.
